english: After repeated applications , it is dried and polished .
chinese: 经过反复上料，然后晾干和磨光。

english: He washed the dishes and put them in the plate rack to dry .
chinese: 他洗了盘子并放在盘子架上晾干。

english: Then we dried them slowly, over a period of many months .
chinese: 要慢慢地把它们晾干，我们又得等上几个月。

english: No , but i will put it out in the sunshine to let it air out .
chinese: 别，但我将把它拿到外面的阳光下晾干。
晾干造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: After picking end mainly dry mainly peanut sales
chinese: 主要是采摘完晾干后销售干花生为主。

english: He said that they should be hung up to dry
chinese: 他说应该把它们挂起来晾干。

english: The clothes are still moist . dry them in the sun
chinese: 这些衣服还是湿的，把他们在太阳下晾干。

english: Dry the tea bags and you can use them again
chinese: 把茶袋晾干下次可以接着用

english: S : they ' re drying , darling . ( < - - soooo * cute * ! ! !
The chemical must then be salted out and allowed to dry
chinese: 之后，这化学药品必须加盐分离，晾干。

english: Gordon : don ' t you take your clothes outside to dry them
chinese: 戈登：你是不是把衣服挂到外面去晾干。

english: They ' re drying , darling . ( < - - soooo * cute * ! ! !
Theresa : does the salmon need to be dried after rinsing it
chinese: 特里萨:马哈鱼在冲洗过后还用晾干吗？

english: No , but i will put it out in the sunshine to let it air out
chinese: 不，但我将把它拿到外面的阳光下晾干。
